inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: cardiac MRI showed a mass that was 3cm x 1cm on the lateral wall of the right atrium adjacent to the AV junction

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Patients with systemic disorders, including diabetes mellitus, metabolic bone disease, rheumatoid arthritis, mucocutaneous disorders, immunological disorders, hepatitis, or

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Individuals who were on antibiotics, anti-inflammatory agents, corticosteroids, immunosuppressants, anticoagulants, or hormonal contraceptives for any reason, at least 6 months prior to the procedure

notes: Patient has a history of PCOS, Obesity, HTN, and previous viral encephalitis/meningitis with residual deficits. However, they do not have any systemic disorders or are on medications that would exclude them from the study.
